Text.Page:
There are so many hired hands out here...

I've heard the emblems the {@LinkCreature:40#27#Crestarath mercenaries} wear look like skulls. Will you get some for me? I'd like to see for myself.

I was afraid of that. These match crests given by the Legion of Thulsa. Not good news at all.

Not to mention, they're creepy...
I'm still waiting for those skull emblems the {@LinkCreature:40#27#mercenaries} wear. Have you found any?
